de.japi.components

Class Japi2PanelBorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
      • de.japi.components.Japi2PanelBorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.border.Border

    public class Japi2PanelBorder
extends javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
    A simple custom border implementation to provide the four border types for a JPanel as defined in the JAPI kernel documentation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
